text:
It is mind boggling that they spend so much to advertise #alcohol (a brain destroying, #cancer causing neurotoxin) while acting like scared children when it comes to #marijuana.

#Cannabis is listed as a schedule 1 drug while hypocritically alcohol isn't even scheduled.

#COVID19 https://t.co/RaH0pCnEU4 https://t.co/9b37UuvXPe
